instance_template: workshop(1..12). topic("AI"; "Physics"; "Math"; "Linguistics"). day(1..3). slot("morning"; "midday"; "evening"). room(1..4). slotOrder("morning", 1). slotOrder("midday", 2). slotOrder("evening", 3). timeIndex(D, S, ((D-1)*3) + O) :- day(D), slotOrder(S, O).
generator: { topicOf(W, T) : topic(T) } = 1 :- workshop(W). { scheduled(W, R, S, D) : room(R), slot(S), day(D) } = 1 :- workshop(W).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Ensure strict adherence to the venue policy that no more than one workshop occupies a room during any given timeslot.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R, S, D), scheduled(W2, R, S, D), W1 != W2.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Policy dictates a maximum of two workshops per room per day to manage venue maintenance and staff workload.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- room(R), day(D), N = #count { W : scheduled(W, R, S, D) }, N > 2.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: To ensure adequate preparation time, a mandatory break must separate any two sessions held in the same room on the same day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(_, R, S1, D), scheduled(_, R, S2, D), slotOrder(S1, O1), slotOrder(S2, O2), |O1 - O2| == 1.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Comply with facility management's restriction that Room 2 is unavailable for use during the evening sessions.
Business Requirements: Observe capacity limitations by prohibiting Artificial Intelligence or Physics workshops from being scheduled in Room 4.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W, 4, S, D), topicOf(W, T), T = ("AI"; "Physics").

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Follow the thematic programming rule that all Artificial Intelligence workshops must be scheduled during morning sessions.
Business Requirements: Adhere to the curriculum timeline requiring all Physics workshops to be completed by the end of Day 2.
Business Requirements: Ensure logistics compliance by restricting all Mathematics workshops to Room 1 or Room 3.
Business Requirements: To prevent scheduling conflicts for the target audience, no two Linguistics workshops may be held concurrently.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R1, S, D), scheduled(W2, R2, S, D), topicOf(W1, "Linguistics"), topicOf(W2, "Linguistics"), W1 != W2.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Maintain thematic consistency by ensuring each room hosts only one specific discipline per day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R, S1, D), scheduled(W2, R, S2, D), topicOf(W1, T1), topicOf(W2, T2), T1 != T2.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Guarantee program breadth by including at least one session from every discipline on each day of the symposium.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), topic(T), #count { W : topicOf(W, T), scheduled(W, R, S, D) } = 0.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: The symposium's opening presentation—defined as the workshop at the earliest scheduled time—must be an Artificial Intelligence session.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W, R, S, D), timeIndex(D, S, I), M = #min { TI : scheduled(_, _, TS, DS), timeIndex(DS, TS, TI) }, I = M, not topicOf(W, "AI").

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: The symposium's closing session—defined as the workshop at the latest scheduled time—must be a Linguistics presentation.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W, R, S, D), timeIndex(D, S, I), M = #max { TI : scheduled(_, _, TS, DS), timeIndex(DS, TS, TI) }, I = M, not topicOf(W, "Linguistics").

soft_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Maximize venue utilization by identifying and penalizing any unoccupied room slots during the symposium.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("IdleSlot", (R, S, D), 1) :- room(R), slot(S), day(D), not scheduled(_, R, S, D).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Name, Tuple : penalty(Name, Tuple, Cost) }.
